description: Tono (real name Juumonji Shigetora 十文字重虎) was once a brave samurai lord during the Sengoku period but has since become destitute and is now living in a rowhouse district. Despite his scary looks he actually has a very gentle heart. One day he decides to take in a http://anidb.net/ch146942 [dog] that he found on the street. His life would never be the same again.
name: Tono
